org.cryptacular.spec

Class AEADBlockCipherSpec

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cryptacular.spec.AEADBlockCipherSpec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Spec<org.bouncycastle.crypto.modes.AEADBlockCipher>

    public class AEADBlockCipherSpec
extends Object
implements Spec<org.bouncycastle.crypto.modes.AEADBlockCipher>
    Describes an AEAD block cipher in terms of a (algorithm, mode) tuple and provides a facility to create a new instance of the cipher via the newInstance() method.
    Version:
    $Revision: 2744 $
    Author:
    Middleware Services

        public static AEADBlockCipherSpec parse(String specification)
